verses.roman:
tomā-sabāra ājñā vinā calilāma vṛndāvana
yāite nārila, vighna kaila nivartana

synonyms: tomā-sabāra—of all of you; ājñā—order; vinā—without; calilāma—I started; vṛndāvana—for Vṛndāvana; yāite nārila—not able to go; vighna—some obstruction; kaila—did; nivartana—made to return.
translation: Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu informed them all, "Without your order, I tried to go to Vṛndāvana. There was some obstacle, however, and I had to return.
